data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Manicaland to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manicaland, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Manicaland, Zimbabwe, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Manicaland, Zimbabwe to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, we ask for 318 new simple churches in the state of Manicaland, Zimbabwe. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,590,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Marathi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, train the church of Manicaland, Zimbabwe to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Manicaland, Zimbabwe humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary:
the state of Manicaland, Zimbabwe has a population of 1,590,100.

We estimate Manicaland has 401,030 people who might know Jesus, 820,622 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 368,448 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 23.17 percent of the people of Manicaland are far from Jesus.

location.name: Manicaland
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Ndau, Shona, Doma, Vadoma, Makua, Makhuwa-Meetto
